Hangi işlemin sizi uzun vadede mutlu ede: You should decide over time which procedure will make you happy in the long run. You can be sure that we will guide you in the best way possible.
Renklendirmenin nasıl görüneceğine birli: We decide together how the coloring will look. We can achieve a lipstick effect or work in a softer way.
İşlem öncesi uygulama yapılacak bölge an: The area to be treated is numbed with anesthetic cream before the procedure. Supplementary intermediate anesthesia can be used as needed during the procedure. Pain and discomfort are minimized.
Renklendirme işlemi ortalama 2-3 yıl kal: The coloring procedure has an average durability of 2-3 years. However, this period may vary depending on the person's skin structure, age, exposure to the sun, and the use of cosmetic products.

Kıl Tekniği (Microblading) her kaşa ve c: Can Hair Technique (Microblading) be applied to every eyebrow and skin?
Hayır. Kıl Tekniği için karma veya kuru: No. Hair Technique requires a combination or dry, thin skin.
Kalıcı Kaş işlemi acıtır mı?: Does Permanent Eyebrow procedure cause pain?
Ağrı insandaki ağrı eşiğine göre değişir: Pain varies according to the pain threshold of the person. Local anesthetic cream is applied for pain reduction when necessary.

It takes an average of 1-2 hours.
